title: Arthritis: a dialogue with pain
creator_credit: Susan Huycke, Roman Kroitor, William Weintraub, Robert Verrall and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A film about arthritis, its effect upon people’s lives, the nature of the disease, and how it can be combated. Through the stories of people suffering from arthritis—young and old, mildly to severely afflicted—and interviews with medical professionals, this documentary provides answers to widely asked questions. It is also about pain and the will to conquer pain.
